title: Say Yes
description: In Book 2 of THE SPIRIT WRITINGS series, Ava's world opens up for the first time to include romance, a circle of Spiritualist friends, and the unexpected development of her psychic gift. Finally she knows where and with whom she belongs. For all this adventure she must credit her new best friend Parisienne Barclay, but Ava quickly realizes Pari has her own selfish agenda. With Ava the members of their Spiritualist circle experience more and more of the otherworldly communications they seek, but Pari makes sure everyone knows where to point the spotlight. When a visit to a decrepit house with an unfortunate history results in an impromptu psychic session, the group is presented with a task theyâ€™re not sure they want to take on. Ava finds she may have the protective friendship of her circle, but will she ever feel safe truly being herself?
author: Lisa Borja
